overview: Imagine a club where you can become the sexual prey of anyone with a steady hand and a keen eye. Imagine a club where men size up their catch from around corners, concealed from your line of view. When a red laser beam cuts through the smoky haze and hits your bare chest, things are just starting to heat up. It's the ultimate game of cat and mouse and the stakes go beyond domination and control. Will the hunted fall victim to the hunter, or will the hunter get captured by the game? Starring Falcon Exclusive Josh Weston, Trey Casteel, Robert Van Damme, Marcos David, Marco Paris, Troy Punk, Rob Ramos, Jason Ridge, Brad Rock, Parker Williams.
title: The Hunted
